overview: I am Garry and there is nothing so special about me even though with time you could find something special lol.. Well why i joined the site,i did because it has come to a time in life where i have to settle down and have my own family and when i say settle down i mean settle down with the right woman a woman who is loving, honest and caring, someone who knows what it is to be married, someone who does not cheat.I will like to know what your intentions are.I hope i don’t scare you away from the part where i said am a missionary as i know not everyone likes what i do reaching out to the poor and needy etc.Basically i minister to the motherless babies, hiv/aids victims and the beggers on the streets.I took a step with the site, because a friend of mine made it with a wonderful woman in his life 2months ago and are now happily married, i must say i truly admire their success so far and they are both Christians to crown it up so that’s why i took a step forward and joined the site. How did this all start, i was at the age of 6 when my mom came to pick me up at the motherless babies home and took me as her Son since she never got married and liked kids so i happened to be her only child if you know what i mean. At my age of 11 when mom died a friend of hers who stays in Canada came and took me over to her place where i joined the ministery and became a missionary and was later chosen to be one of those who will be traveling abroad to minister.I was firstly in SPAIN to minister for 2wks after which i was taken to London where i am presently to do the Lords work. well London is a wonderful place and its my first time coming here, i will be here for 2months after which i will be going back to Canada where i reside but if by his grace i find a special woman on this dating site and things work for good for us then i will relocate for her. As the bible says.
